entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 6:28 PM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
